snippet: The market dropped a day after the Fed held off raising interest rates. Investors seemed to see the decision as a signal that the global economy is weak.
abstract: Stocks swoon as fears appear over slowing global growth.
lead_paragraph: The market dropped a day after the Fed held off raising interest rates. Investors seemed to see the decision as a signal that the global economy is weak.

headline.main: U.S. Stocks Follow Global Markets Lower, Erasing Week’s Gain
